title: Cleric Spells
content: Save Produce Flame Cantrip Conjuration Action A flickering flame appears in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 9m radius and deals 1d8 Fire damage when thrown. Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an action. Until Long Rest Resistance Cantrip Abjuration Action Make a target more resistant to spell effects and conditions: it receives a +1d4 bonus to Saving Throws. 10 turns Melee Concentration Sacred
